Package core

Class Petrinet

java.lang.Object
core.Petrinet
public class Petrinet extends Object

Class representing a petrinet.

It contains a set of places and transitions. It keeps track of all ids and ensures no duplicate ids are added. When adding edges it also ensures that they are only added between transitions and places. Since edges are not a data structure on their own it also keeps track of original edge ids (needed for saving).

Listeners serve as a means for communicating with the ReachabilityGraph (PetrinetStateChangedListener) and the PetrinetGraph (PetrinetComponentChangedListener). For more information on the listeners also refer to ProgramDocumentation.pdf.

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(String source, String target, String id) throws InvalidEdgeOperationException, DuplicateIdException
      Adds an edge.
      Parameters:
      source - the source of the edge
      target - the target of the edge
      id - the id for the edge
      Throws:
      InvalidEdgeOperationException - thrown if source or target do not exist, if both source and target are transitions/places or if the edge already exists
      DuplicateIdException - thrown if id already exists
